title: Correction to: Scope and adaptive value of modulating aggression over breeding stages in a competitive female bird
content: This is a correction to: Elizabeth M George, Abigail M Weber, Kimberly A Rosvall, Scope and adaptive value of modulating aggression over breeding stages in a competitive female bird, Behavioral Ecology, Volume 35, Issue 4, July/August 2024, arae042, https://doi.org/10.1093/beheco/arae042.
